scripts.alpha: yarn run swap:alpha && firebase use alpha && yarn run deploy:mobile
scripts.beta: yarn run swap:beta && firebase use beta && yarn run deploy:mobile
scripts.master: yarn run swap:master && firebase use master && yarn run deploy:mobile
scripts.staging:alpha: yarn run swap:alpha && firebase use alpha && yarn run deploy:staging-mobile
scripts.staging:beta: yarn run swap:beta && firebase use beta && yarn run deploy:staging-mobile
scripts.staging:master: yarn run swap:master && firebase use master && yarn run deploy:staging-mobile
